page.title: 04Games We Play at School
page.content: The games we play on our playtimes at school are pretend fighting,which is just playing around on the grass.We also play tig,or hospital tig which is different because in hospital tig you have to hold where they tig or touch you,but you do not in ordinary tig. Sometimes we play Red Rover.When somebody calls you you have to run over to the other people.If you do not get through you join on the other side.If you get through you stay n your own side. When we do not know what to play in the netball season,we sometimes play netball and if one of us brings a ball we play passing shooting or football.We also play F.A. which is when someone is in goal and the other people tackle one another to try and score a goal. , tackling
